lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: This is a group donation made in memory of Anna Boterman. It will continue to be loaned as needed.

lender.name: Nan and sisters
lender.loan_because: I am one of sisters4 that are all independent, strong women. We want to lend our support to other strong women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher for handicap children age 11-14.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping other women support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I project manager the design and building of the interiors of retail stores.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I got help when starting out and now I can help someone else.

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter and I also work for a website which helps people with serious medical issues.

lender.name: Building Loans
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a good roof over their head. I would like to encourage people to build with local, sustainable materials that are good for the environment and the people living in it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a builder that works with low cost materials like earth and straw.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I believe all of us deserve a chance to strive for a good life -- and we need to help each other make that happen.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can!

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I love helping people!! And want a better world for my son.

lender.name: Tina
lender.occupation: Mother and High School Photography Teacher
lender.loan_because: We live a good life. If you can reach out and help someone else, you should. With this website, a small token can fufill a big dream for another in a far off land.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher in America. I teach Photography and Computers.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I believe.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothing for young women.

lender.name: Rory
lender.occupational_info: I read.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves me and makes me want to help people because he saved me
lender.occupational_info: I read a lot of books and take hard Physics tests - then I go to the streets and play basketball

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I care. God has blessed me and my family and I'd like to pass it on.

lender.name: Steven, Mette, T&F
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to make a difference for someone. This must be one of the best ways to use the web ever!
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of four - one blacksmith, one biologist and two children at school.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate and can afford to help those who are not as fortunate. Also believe in rewarding those who work hard and have a passion in something. This organization gives to such people.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage people to visit my city for work or pleasure. I love the city I live in and want to share that with the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help record labels sell music online.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the passion and dedication of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sailor in the US Navy, currently living in Japan.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe every child deserves a chance. That chance begins with a hot meal and roof over their head. I believe in education to empower families to better their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: A non profit foundation dedicated to meeting the basic needs of children living in poverty.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I find it very important to share the free enterprise system with those who want to help their families and better their business.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: a helping hand is what we all need at one time or another.
lender.occupational_info: helping small and mid size business owners get more customers and increase profits while having a better quality of life

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: It connects me to the larger world of women entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Writing and administering grant funded projects that assist low to moderate income families

lender.name: Annelise
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others the ability to create their own opportunities and livelihood.

lender.name: Catt
lender.loan_because: It seems like a very worthwhile project!
lender.occupational_info: I create small business projects

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are eager to start businesses and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I was an engineer who helped design processes to build computer chips before I retired.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone in the world must support and empower each other to become all they can be. It is important to share what we have, as we are the same, regardless of country, culture, religion, race or age.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children, math, english, etc. I also am an Astrologer, who helps people discover their true purpose in life, their soul's journey.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I care, all of us have to help the world be a little brighter!
lender.occupational_info: I do graphic and package design for products sold all over the world. I also draw and make fun things in my spare time!

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: It's a practical way that I can make a difference in gratitude for God's goodness to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help Christians learn how to make a positive difference in the world.

lender.name: UGO
lender.occupational_info: I work on all the digital stuff that no one should really care about ..frankly, which is the point in having ringtones and wallpapers on your cellphone? that's why i like supporting concrete projects

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to do whatever I can to make this world a better place. And it's good travel karma.

lender.name: Bergsveinn
lender.loan_because: Im sick of the ruling class messing everything up, creating unnecessary injustice. The best way to change is starting with one self.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I feel it is vital to share my resources with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: As a Nia Technique instructor, I help people find joy in staying healthy and fit.

lender.name: Danica
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do. Helen Keller

lender.name: Narien Teas
lender.occupational_info: We sell tea.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want my money to go to people trying to do something, not to overhead costs.
lender.occupational_info: I write and produce documentary film, manage international events, and am about to pursue a degree in sustainable urban planning.

lender.name: Rae
lender.loan_because: This year I informed my six adult children that I would not be sending gifts but would send funds to Kiva in the spirit of the holidays. Their support is 100% positive.
lender.occupational_info: I delivered mail to about 600 boxes on a rural route in California.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are motivated to improve life for themselves, their family and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I research and write reports, newsletters and Web pages for organizations that work on such issues as housing for low-income people, early childhood education, and public transportation.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: just a little bit can make a tremendous difference

lender.name: Juliann
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in order to better care for myself and son- I return the favour. People living in greater harmony with nature and each other is very important to me. I loan to expand opportunities and to limit desperation and suffering.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother- it is my whole joy. I work as a healer with my hands and spirit. I am also an artist - creating gifts for mothers.

lender.name: Jeff & Marybeth
lender.loan_because: i have seen the need in the Philippines and that people will work hard to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Asian Geography and Culture.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It is important to me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I provide low income families with funds so they can put their children in safe care while they go to work.

lender.name: Jaap
lender.loan_because: I hope it works
lender.occupational_info: manager at a university hospital where young people study medicine

lender.name: Marlowe
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I am blessed with a truly good life, and I'd like to help others achieve a good life too.
lender.occupational_info: I love to help people become their best, and follow their dreams.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for, and so much to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the second half of life, training to become a psychotherapist.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.occupational_info: I teach creative writing to children. I'm also a novelist.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I believe this to be the most empowering way to support those who want to establish self sustainability
lender.occupational_info: I support others to see the choices they have in their lives and to support them in achieving their dreams

lender.name: Laura

lender.occupational_info: Giving people the means to improve their lives.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: the time is always right to do what is right.
lender.occupational_info: I work with under-served (aka, brilliant, vibrant, challenging, joyful, ridiculous) high school students to help them create positive change in their personal lives and communities. I love my job!

lender.name: Kieran
lender.loan_because: I have spent time in the Sudan in 1983 and my wife and I working in the US Indian Health Service (Navajo Area), and with lower income families in Cincinnati and would like to help such people as much as possible
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I care for children providing healthcare and doing research to improve child health. Improving the economic opportunities for families will ultimately improve their children's health and opportunities in life.

lender.name: vada blue
lender.loan_because: I really love to give to others who are less fortunate than me.It makes me happy giving, and I'm sure the people that I lend my money to them will be happy too!
lender.occupational_info: Iwould describe my work by saying that I really care about what I'm giving,and I just thank the LORD for my life.

lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: No one can do everything, but everyone can do something.

lender.occupational_info: Helping people get well.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I would like to help women succeed in their own businesses.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: The distribution of wealth in our world is a major challenge to be overcome.
lender.occupational_info: I coach people who have mental illness to live meaningful and happy lives.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: People need help, and I can help them.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: "Freely you recieved, freely give." - Jesus
lender.occupational_info: As an environmental educator I teach children and their families about nature, and how to take care of the earth God has given us.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: i have been granted a good way of life and want to help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Kohorst Farm
lender.loan_because: We have a family of 5 kids and work together on the farm raising pumpkins, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, potatoes, strawberries etc. to put food on our table. We are a small farm business raising corn, soybeans and alfalfa hay with our rich, fertile land. This year God has blessed us with good weather and we had a record corn crop. We want to share our blessings with others who are struggling like we have for many years.
lender.occupational_info: Farmers

lender.name: E. from NY
lender.loan_because: I care and I know how much help a small loan can do.

lender.name: Sam
lender.occupational_info: I capture memories with my camera!

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I've been incredibly blessed and desire to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Jeremy (right of pic) introduced me (left of pic) to Kiva. I believe if we all take small steps to help each other we can achieve great things.
lender.occupational_info: I consult to large corporations on using data to more efficiently target the right customers and prospects with the right offer at the right time through direct marketing to save cost and improve customer service.

lender.name: Vannessa
lender.loan_because: i care :)

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I believe all should have an opportunity to support their families and a decent life. These are hard working people who deserve loans that will enable them to make their lives and families lives better, as well as the community in which they live. One needs the other.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer within my community, at the library, (reading is very important to me, and the ability to do so.) I also participate in our local historical society. I knit small blankets for babies and children who have illness that requires hospitalization and enjoy visiting with them and reading them stories and playing with them. I enjoy giving back to my community with volunteering and receive a lot more in satisfaction to myself.
